details: Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in IDF v0.10.0-0C03-03 and ZLF v0.10.0-0C03-04. This vulnerability allows an attacker to store malicious JavaScript payload in software that will run in the victim's browser. Exploiting this vulnerability requires authenticating to the device and executing certain commands that can only be executed with permissions higher than the view permission.
